page.title: 10KEMPSTON SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: {A COMPARISON OF 2 SHOPPING CENTRES. < % refer to those answering YES> { A = Springfield Centre { B = Saxon Centre <Sainsbury Store> { A B 1.Are these your local shops?{88 59 2.Do you shop daily? {37 16 twice weekly? {33 17 weekly? {19 27 monthly? {11 40 3.Is this your main shopping { area? {51 78 4.Would you travel further to { buy cheaper goods? {47 22 5.Are supermarkets cheaper? {98 85 6.Do you get good value here?{98 100 7.Does easy parking influence { you? {65 85 8.Would you shop here on { Sundays? {65 34 9.Is service Excell./Good {13/47 22/71 Fair/Poor {40/ 0 7/ 0
